participant_1.name: Frank
participant_1.personality: He is laid-back and enjoys the simple pleasures of life, like grilling and gardening.
participant_1.background: i like to grill outdoors. i have been retired for a years. i move south during the winter. i go gambling in my spare time. i enjoy mowing my lawn on sunny days.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: She is active and sociable, balancing her career in sports with family life.
participant_2.background: i live in a three storey house. my family is continuously growing. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i am a professional tennis player. i'm married to a doctor.

content.text: I'm not going to be there.
